#summary How to add jSCEP to your own application.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Introduction =

This page describes how to add jSCEP to your own application.

= Details =

== Dependencies ==

jSCEP requires the Bouncy Castle Provider for _some operations_.

 and "SMIME/CMS" libraries from the [http://www.bouncycastle.org/ Bouncy Castle] project, both of which should be added to your project classpath.  Both libraries can be found on the [http://www.bouncycastle.org/latest_releases.html Bouncy Castle Latest Releases] page.

=== Bouncy Castle Provider ===

Follow the [http://www.bouncycastle.org/specifications.html#install installation instructions] on the BC site.

== Using jSCEP ==

Using jSCEP is *easy*.  Simply download the [http://code.google.com/p/jscep/downloads/list?q=label:Featured%20type=Library the latest release] of jSCEP, add it to your application classpath alongside the required libraries from the Bouncy Castle project and you're ready to go.

See: SecurityManagerRequirements
